item.title: Welcome to my Blog
item.description:
Hello there,

The purpose of this silly blog will be to simply show my resume/portfolio and my thoughts regarding the software engineering, computer science and some machine learning/data science subjects.

This is basically another silly random developer blog.

Gnoirzox

item.title: About me

Hello,

I am just a regular web developer trying out the Hugo static website generator. You will find more informations about me in a forthcoming future.
